contents: INDUSTRY REVOLUTIONARY TECHNOLOGY-Our masticating juicer applied the planetary orbit structure which perfectly combined the screw and the filter, so that the juice extraction system runs stably without shaking. ranklist.title: Hurom H101 Easy Clean Masticating Slow Juicer - Matte Silver
contents: Scrub-Free Cleaning: Say good bye to small holes on the strainer that you had to scrub to remove pulp. With the new strainers with large, elongated grooves, simply rinse the parts in water.
Tilted Chamber & Juice Outlet: The 3-degree tilt inside the chamber and juice outlet will let you more easily pour out the juice and leave less mess inside the juicer.
Pulp Outlet: Pulp outlet will open 180 degrees so that you can easily flush out any remaining pulp inside the chamber.

Slow Squeeze Technology: The H101 Easy Clean Slow Juicer rotates at a speed of just 43 revolutions per minute to mimic the motion of a hand squeezing juice. This patented Slow Squeeze Technology ensures your juice stays fresh and in its most natural state.

Taste & Pulp Control: We‚Äôve spent decades perfecting our juicers for taste. Juice created with a Hurom slow juicer is fresh, unprocessed and pure. The H101 Easy Clean Slow Juicer also comes with a control lever and a fine and coarse strainer that allow you to control the amount of pulp to suit your taste.

ranklist.title: Kuvings Whole Slow Juicer Elite C7000S - Higher Nutrients and Vitamins, BPA-Free Components, Easy to Clean, Ultra Efficient 240W, 60RPMs-Silver
contents: Whole Slow Juicer: Its 60RPMs low-speed masticating technology gently squeezes the ingredients from food preserving all beneficial nutrients, prevents oxidation and allows juice to be stored up to 72 hours without degradation. Materials-Ultem, Tritan, ABS, PC

Time Saver: The 3‚Äù wide feed chute allows for larger ingredients without cutting, means less prep time. Chrome plated drip-free juice spout helps create mixed juices and rinse between recipes. Funnel allows for smaller produce in juicer without spilling.

Powerful and Efficient: The 240W motor is powerful, durable and works quietly. The larger pulp outlet duct reduces pulp in the extract and makes more juice. Sieve allows you to determine the amount of pulp in your juice. What‚Äôs more, clean-up is a breeze!

Versatile: It‚Äôs a 3 in 1 Multi Juicer ‚Äì prepare juices and sorbets. Juices everything from fruits, vegetables, herbs to wheatgrass. Prepare baby food and nut milk. Sleek design takes up less counter space.

Trusted Brand: For 40 years, Kuvings has been committed to quality you can trust. Each item includes our 10-year warranty. If you have any questions, don‚Äôt hesitate to let us know. Our customer service team is always happy to help.

ranklist.title: Breville BJE830BSS Juice Founatin Cold XL Centrifugal Juicer, Brushed Stainless Steel
contents: The Breville Juice Fountain Cold XL features a bigger 3.5 inch feed chute and can extract 70 fl oz of nutrient rich juice up to five times faster than a 'cold press' machine; Juicer equipped with Cold Spin Technology and Noise Reduction Technology
COLD EXTRACTION SYSTEM: A Breville juicer with Cold Spin Technology and an Italian-made precision mesh filter, allows you to avoid damage to vitamins and minerals from heat and processing
SHORT PREP TIME: The Breville Juice Fountain Cold XL's unique 3.5 inch extra wide chute feed allows you to juice whole fruits and vegetables without pre-cutting
SPACE SAVING DESIGN: With the pulp bin located behind the product base, the Juice Fountain Cold XL features a new and unique space saving design for a better use of your countertop space
NOISE REDUCTION TECHNOLOGY: Imagine great performances that‚Äôs easier on the ear; Juicing on quiet setting reduces mechanical noise by 40%
EXTRA LARGE SEAL AND STORE: Juice and seal in a XL 70 fl oz jug for the whole family or store it in the refrigerator for up to 3 days
JUICE NOZZLE: Perfect for mess-free juicing straight into a glass; Simply invert the nozzle when finished to avoid juice drips
INCLUDED ACCESSORIES: 70 fl oz Easy Seal Juice Jug with Froth Separator, Detachable Spout for Juicing Directly into Glass and Easy Cleaning Brush
CAPACITY & SETTINGS: 70 fl oz Seal & Store Jug and 3.9 qt Pulp Container; Fast and variable speed settings allowing you to extract juice up to 5 times faster than a 'cold press'
WARRANTY: 1 Year Limited Product Warranty; Power: 1200 Watts; Voltage: 110 to 120 Volts

ranklist.title: Omega Juicer Cold Press 365 Vertical Slow Masticating Extractor for Fruits and Vegetables, BPA-Free, 65 RPM, 150-Watts, Silver
contents: VERSATILE SLOW JUICER - Preserve vitamins, minerals, enzymes, and antioxidants with cold press technology, using slow 45-65 RPM juicing speeds
USER FRIENDLY - Simple two speed operation with reverse feature and powerful auger allows high-yield juicing of a variety of fruits, vegetables, and leafy greens
LESS MESS - Close the no-drip tap to mix juices before dispensing, then dispense your juice into the included container or right into your glass with no-drip dispensing
MULTIPLE FEATURES - Safety Interlock; Must be engaged for juicer to operate. Reverse function allows you to easily stop and clear clogs for continuous juicing
SPACE SAVING - Slim design takes up less countertop space and fits easily under most cabinets for everyday use
